translated: â€œWith one intention, one should practice the way of sensual desire; non-human beings practice the way of sensual desire with the praise of arahants; the Bodhisatta goes to the lower realms because of the practice of sensual desire for sovereignty; one enters into the state of being in the womb; one does what is difficult to do; one does what is painful to do; one points out another teacher; there is no passion that is like passion; there is no hatred that is like hatred; there is no delusion that is like delusion; there is no defilement that is like a defilement; form is not fully developed; the faculty of final knowledge is not fully developed.â€
The short one is fifty-five.
The summary:
â€œNew, extinction, with one intention.â€
The summary of the fifty
The great rule, underlying tendencies,
and the five small rejections;
The crushing of the words of others,
and the suttas as the basis, collected together;
The illumination at the time of the Teacher,
the section on the grounds for disputes.
The thirty-fifth section
The section on the grounds for disputes is finished.
